goals.title: Graduate High School with GPA 3.5 or Higher
goals.description: This one is self explanatory. I would like to graduate with an overall GPA of 3.5 or higher as it would expand my my options coming out of high school.

goals.title: College
goals.description: My top priority right now is to graduate from High School and go to College. The main college I'm looking to get into is LSU because that is the college my parents both attended. However, if I have a change of interest between now and my high school graduation, I'll make the best choice when the time comes.

goals.title: Degree
goals.description: My natural next goal is to graduate from college and get a degree that will best set me on a viable career path. I believe an engineering or web design major would best suit my interests. I would minor in something I'm interested in but may not lead to a career, such as history or geography.

goals.title: Career
goals.description: The main goal in my life is to obtain a steady career. The reason this is my main goal is because it will take up the largest part of my life. I would like to have a career in professionally playing videogames or making artwork, but unfortunately these aren't realistic careers. Realistically, I'd like to get an engineering job as stated by what I want for a degree.

goals.title: Retirement
goals.description: The final large goal I have in life is to retire comfortably. This one  is so far ahead in life that I haven't thought about it much, but at some point I would love to have made it to a point where I can live in comfort without having to worry about anything.
